verbs.description: As if [ARG0: he] [ARGM-TMP: suddenly] [V: learned] [ARG1: a new word] , Donald Trump seems to have discovered a shiny , new object that is keeping him entertained and otherwise preoccupied : The power of the pardon . Like a child in a candy store , he has , of late , been issuing a flurry ...
